scripts.build: babel src/config.js src/index.js -d build && babel src/mongo/** -x '.js' -d build/mongo && babel src/mulesoft_api/** -x '.js' -d build/mulesoft_api && babel src/modules/** -x '.js' -d build/modules && babel src/selenium/** -x '.js' -d build/selenium && cp -r src/scripts build
scripts.start: nodemon --ignore build/ --exec 'rm -rf build && mkdir build && cp .env build && npm run build'
